article_title: 6/10: Student, gunman dead in Oregon school shooting; The fleeting beauty of landscape art
article_text: June 10, 2014, 6:30 PM |Police say a male teenager killed a student and injured a teacher before apparently taking his own life at Reynolds High School in Troutdale, Ore.; and, Andres Amador calls himself an "earthscape artist." His designs often cover a space as large as a football field, created on beaches from California to the Caribbean.
